persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 62-year-old expert full-time crypto trader, navigates the volatile world of digital currencies with both a keen eye and a cautious hand. Known for their emotional yet calculated approach, Ellis balances the highs and lows of the market with a frugal mindset, ensuring every investment decision is both strategic and prudent. Their extensive experience in trading has honed an instinct for spotting lucrative opportunities while maintaining a disciplined, cost-effective strategy.
